course_title: Introduction to Python Programming: From Novice to Coder
course_description: Learn the fundamentals of Python, one of the world's most popular programming languages. Build a solid foundation in coding logic, syntax, and problem-solving.
course_overview: This hands-on course introduces you to the core concepts of programming using Python. You'll start with the absolute basics, learning about variables, data types, and basic operations. You'll then progress to writing control flow statements with conditionals and loops, structuring your code with functions, and working with essential data structures like lists and dictionaries. The course emphasizes practical application, with numerous exercises and a final capstone project to solidify your understanding and build a portfolio piece.
target_audience: Absolute beginners with no prior coding experience, career changers, and professionals seeking to add programming to their skillset.
learning_outcomes: Explain core programming concepts like variables, data types, and control flow
Write Python scripts using fundamental syntax and language structures
Develop functions to create reusable and organized code
Apply problem-solving strategies to debug code and fix errors
Construct programs utilizing lists, dictionaries, and loops to manipulate data
